component_sequence_name.description: For Components that have a sequence to them, like documents or other data this is where the defintion name is stored

component_sequence_value.description: For Components that have a sequence this is where the sequence value is stored... 001, 002, A, B C...

context.description: Container location where the data is stored

context_id.description: Unique Identifier of a context that this data belongs, a project, enterprise, ect.

component_type.description: Definition of component; Like Person.Details, Specification.Document, Submital.Responce, etc

component_type_reference.description: reference to the version and location of the defintion of the component_type; Can be local or URI etc

component_type_payload.description: what is the expected encododing of the data in the component payload.  json,geojson,gltf, object, 3dm, rvt, ifc etc

owner.description: The user or entity that is the owner of this component

status.description: User define value for nature of component

active.description: Is the component a valid, active component

creation_date.description: Date that this version of the component was created

hash1.description: Hash of potentially many that is used to validate the object
